CmdLine: rm -fr /app/* &&   apt-get update && apt-get install -yqq wget unzip php5-curl dnsutils &&   rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: wget -O /mutillidae.zip http://sourceforge.net/projects/mutillidae/files/latest/download &&   unzip /mutillidae.zip &&   rm -rf /app/* &&   cp -r /mutillidae/* /app  &&   rm -rf /mutillidae  &&   chown -R www-data:www-data /app  &&   sed -i 's/DirectoryIndex index.html.*/DirectoryIndex index.php index.html index.cgi index.pl index.xhtml index.htm/g' /etc/apache2/mods-enabled/dir.conf&&   sed -i 's/static public \$mMySQLDatabaseUsername =.*/static public \$mMySQLDatabaseUsername = "admin";/g' /app/classes/MySQLHandler.php &&   echo "sed -i 's/static public \$mMySQLDatabasePassword =.*/static public \$mMySQLDatabasePassword = \\\"'\$PASS'\\\";/g' /app/classes/MySQLHandler.php" >> /create_mysql_admin_user.sh &&   echo 'session.save_path = "/tmp"' >> /etc/php5/apache2/php.ini
Commands.Name: run
